mapper.select: SELECT A.ROUT_ID, A.ROUT_LEN, A.ROUT_ID, B.NODE_ID, B.NODE_SN, C.STOP_TM_PEAK, C.STOP_TM_NONE_PEAK FROM BMS_ROUT_MST A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_STTN_MST C ON B.NODE_ID = C.STTN_ID WHERE A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND A.WAY_DIV = #{WAY_DIV} ORDER BY ROUT_ID, NODE_SN

SELECT A.ST_STTN_ID, A.ED_STTN_ID, A.OPER_CNT, A.ALLOC_CNT, A.FST_TM, A.LST_TM, A.AM_PEAK_ST_TM, A.AM_PEAK_ED_TM, A.PM_PEAK_ST_TM, A.PM_PEAK_ED_TM, A.AM_PEAK, A.PM_PEAK, A.NONE_PEAK FROM BRT_OPER_PL_MST A WHERE A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.WAY_DIV = #{WAY_DIV}
SELECT A.STTN_ID ,A.STTN_NM ,A.STOP_TM_PEAK ,A.STOP_TM_NONE_PEAK FROM BMS_STTN_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN B ON A.STTN_ID = B.NODE_ID WHERE B.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID};
SELECT * FROM BMS_CRS_MST WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.NODE_ID ,A.NODE_TYPE ,A.NODE_SN ,A.LINK_NODE_YN ,IFNULL(A.CRS_ID, "") AS CRS_ID , SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.PHASE_NO, ',', 1) AS ENT_PHASE_NO_1 , SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(A.PHASE_NO, ',,'), ',', 2), ',', -1) AS ENT_PHASE_NO_2 , SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(A.PHASE_NO, ',,'), ',', 3), ',', -1) AS ENT_PHASE_NO_3 FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_CRS_MST B ON A.CRS_ID = B.CRS_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND A.LINK_NODE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NODE_SN ASC;
SELECT FN_GET_DAY_DIV(#{OPER_DT});

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(B.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,A.WAY_DIV ,A.OPER_SN ,A.NODE_ID ,A.NODE_SN ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.COR_ID ,A.NODE_TYPE
, IFNULL(B.ARRV_TM, A.ARRV_TM) AS ARRV_TM , IFNULL(B.DPRT_TM, A.DPRT_TM) AS DPRT_TM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DTM ,C.REP_ROUT_NM ,C.WAY_ASC_NM ,C.WAY_DESC_NM ,D.ROUT_ID ,D.NODE_NM ,D.ACCRU_LEN ,DATE_FORMAT(E.OCR_DTM, '%H:%i:%s') REAL_ARRV_TM ,DATE_FORMAT(F.OCR_DTM, '%H:%i:%s') REAL_DPRT_TM FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A LEFT JOIN BRT_DAY_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO B ON B.OPER_DT = #{OPER_DT} AND A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID AND A.DAY_DIV = B.DAY_DIV AND A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.OPER_SN = B.OPER_SN AND A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = B.NODE_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST C ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID AND A.NODE_ID = D.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = D.NODE_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BRT_OPER_EVENT_HIS E ON E.EVT_TYPE = "ET001" AND E.OCR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND B.OPER_DT = E.OPER_DT AND A.REP_ROUT_ID = E.REP_ROUT_ID AND A.ROUT_ID = E.ROUT_ID AND A.OPER_SN = E.OPER_SN AND A.NODE_ID = E.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = E.NODE_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BRT_OPER_EVENT_HIS F ON F.EVT_TYPE = "ET002" AND F.OCR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND B.OPER_DT = F.OPER_DT AND A.REP_ROUT_ID = F.REP_ROUT_ID AND A.ROUT_ID = F.ROUT_ID AND A.OPER_SN = F.OPER_SN AND A.NODE_ID = F.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = F.NODE_SN WHERE A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001'|| A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') GROUP BY OPER_SN, NODE_SN ORDER BY OPER_SN, NODE_SN
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A WHERE A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001'|| A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') GROUP BY OPER_SN ORDER BY OPER_SN

SELECT A.COR_ID , A.REP_ROUT_ID , A.COR_NM , A.COR_TYPE , A.MOVE_TM , A.COR_COLOR , A.REMARK , B.REP_ROUT_NM
FROM BRT_COR_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID
AND (A.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND A.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
